alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sedgwick (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 9:27PM MDT until June 23 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Logan County in northeastern Colorado... Northwestern Sedgwick County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 1015 PM MDT. * At 927 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Iliff, or 6 miles northeast of Sterling, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Iliff around 930 PM MDT. Proctor around 945 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Fleming and Crook. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
